commit message: extended support for special characters and some little bug fixes for Android 1.6
extended support for special characters and some little bug fixes for Android 1.6
fixed endless loop in case of apostrophes in SQL strings (especially app names)
the thread pool size has to be independent of the job queue size
added options menu to clear the search history
added the clear search text on resume feature requested by Matt
added option to show contact photos
also use DIPs in the code
task management as I want it to be
task management as I want it to be :-)
translate labels if exact match is possible when locale changed
update the search history while updating the app labels if the locale changed
automatically hide the soft keyboard if the user starts scrolling
remove single items from the search history via long press
new contacts API for >=v2.0 and QuickContactBadge
fixed search history update while showing the quick contact badge
long press on search button launches Quickdroid
long press on search button launches Quickdroid (v2.9.3)
IME Go, DPAD_CENTER and ENTER now launch the first item
hide IME before starting new activity
reordered search results in a more natrural order
activate artist and album search by default on higher power phones
activate artist and album search by default on higher power phones

fixes for Android 2.3
Blame Google for that :-)
new artist and album intents for thos search categories
fixed a bug in contacts search
launch first item on soft keyboard enter key
does not need to be a member variable
fixed back button handling in landscape mode
added boot complete permission for Android 4

New options:
- Automatically close Quickdroid and remove it from the back stack
- Back key handling
Fixed READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE exception caused by reading from com.android.providers.media.MediaProvider
added feature to search contacts in all groups
fixed crash due to apostrophes in strings
Added 'Swipe up from NavBar' gesture to launch Quickdroid.
fixed directory structure after import from Google Code
